dialogue.introduction: My name is Tenryuu. Fufufu, ya scared?
dialogue.library_intro: First of the Tenryuu-class, Tenryuu. I lead the torpedo squadron along with the destroyers. My pal is Tatsuta, of the same class. Is she doing well, I wonder? Well, whatever.
dialogue.secretary2: Don't leave me out if you're going to fight at night, okay?
dialogue.secretary3: Interested in my weapons? 'Cause it easily surpasses any one else in the world!...What? It's old, you say!? ...No way!
dialogue.secretaryidle: Hey, hey! Put me in an operation right now! My body will grow dull.
dialogue.secretarymarried: Ahh? Well, that's the kinda guy the admiral is. Alright!
dialogue.wedding: Fuhaha, do ya' admire my strength? Oh? Not my strength, but me!? Haha, this is a daydream, right!?
dialogue.show_players_score: Letter's here. Hurry and read it.
dialogue.equipment1: You fine powering me up this much~?
dialogue.equipment2: This is it, this is it! I've always wanted something like this! Let me have it now!
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Hey! Don't pull me back from the frontline!
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Oi! Don't withdraw me from the battlefield! Let me fight till my dying breath!
dialogue.docking_complete: The ships that were in repairs are back.
dialogue.ship_construction: A newcomer has made an appearance!
dialogue.return_from_sortie: Finally completed the mission and retreated, so slow.. hurry up~
dialogue.attack: Too scared to speak, huh? Take this!
dialogue.night_battle: Charging into the night! Aren't ya' afraid!
dialogue.night_attack: The smell of gunpowder is the best! Yeah!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: The smell of gunpowder is the best! Yeah!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: The smell of gunpowder is the best! Yeah!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: The smell of gunpowder is the best! Yeah!
dialogue.mvp: It's only natural, I'm the strongest after all!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: To be able to get me to such a state... you're good, I'll praise you for that.
dialogue.sunk: Damn... I can't advance nor retreat, Tatsuta... sorry... I'm going ahead of you...
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: Are you going out, Admiral? It's probably a good idea to take a umbrella with you today. Well, that's what my radar says.
dialogue.midsummer_2015: Yeah! It's summer! Everyone's meeting up at the beach in our swimsuits. We're gonna do some special training using a ball. Make sure the net ain't too high for the destroyers.
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: The year has finally come to an end, Admiral. This year we're hitting the new year's eve bell together. Right?
dialogue.new_year_2016: Happy New Year, Admiral! I'm in your care this year too! Well, I'll show you my strength plenty this year. Fufufu, that's right!
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Ow! Owowow! Why are you guys throwing beans at me!? Hey! Don't say "You're the oni-nanodesu" at me! This thing I'm wearing isn't even a horn! H-Hey Tatsuta! Stop giving them beans to throw!
